downloadTitle: Deploy Software Defined Networks using Virtual Machine Manager
downloadDescription: VMM Service templates to deploy a software defined network infrastructure
detailsSection:
This download contains service templates that can be used with System Center Virtual Machine Manager Technical Preview 3 (TP3) to deploy Software Defined Networking (SDN) fabric services.  These templates are meant to be used in conjunction with the online scenario guide -Deploy Software Defined Networks using Virtual Machine Manager, which can be found at:

https://technet.microsoft.com/en-US/library/mt210892(WS.11).aspx
systemRequirementsSection:
Windows Server 2016 Technical Preview 3
Microsoft System Center Virtual Machine Manager Technical Preview 3
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button on this page to start the download
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, click Run.
    • To save the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save.
    • To cancel the installation, click Cancel.

relatedResourcesSection.title: deploy Software Defined Networks using Virtual Machine Manager
